dict.string: Ariata reads your health data (heart rate, steps, sleep, activity) to provide comprehensive wellness insights. Your health data is stored securely and never shared without your explicit consent.
Ariata continuously tracks your location to provide personalized health insights based on where you spend your time. This data is collected in the background to ensure accurate daily patterns.

Ariata records ambient audio in 30-second intervals to analyze your daily environment and acoustic patterns. All recordings are processed securely and you have full control over when recording is active.
